mapper.select: select * from (select count(distinct task_group_name) as taskGroups, count(distinct task_app_name) as taskApps, count(skyworld_basic_task.task_id) as taskCount from skyworld_basic_task ) as systemStatistics ,(select count(skyworld_basic_job.job_id) as jobCount from skyworld_basic_job ) as taskMeteData ,(select max(job_log_id) as schedulingCount4Historical,count(job_log_id) schedulingCount4Daily from skyworld_job_log where create_time between date_sub(now(), interval 1 day) and now() ) as schedulercount;

select * from (select count(job_log_id) as schedulerTotal from skyworld_job_log where create_time between date_sub(now(), interval 1 day) and now()) as total, (select count(job_log_id) as misTriggerCount from skyworld_job_log where create_time between date_sub(now(), interval 1 day) and now() and job_handle_code = 'LOG_JOB_EXECUTION_MISFIRE') as misTrigger, (select count(job_log_id) as schedulerError from skyworld_job_log where job_handle_code not in ('SUCCESS', 'LOG_JOB_EXECUTION_VETOED','LOG_STATUS_JOB_FINISHED', 'LOG_STATUS_JOB_SCHEDULING', 'FINISHED', 'LOG_JOB_EXECUTION_MISFIRE') and create_time between date_sub(now(), interval 1 day) and now()) as jobError, (select count(task_log_id) as executeError from skyworld_task_log where create_time between date_sub(now(), interval 1 day) and now() and task_status = 'FAIL') as taskError, (select count(task_log_id) as executeTotal from skyworld_task_log where create_time between date_sub(now(), interval 1 day) and now()) as taskExecuteTotal;

select * from (select count(task_id) as taskCount from skyworld_basic_task where task_group_name = #{group,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) as task_temp, (select count(job_id) as jobCount from skyworld_basic_job where job_group = #{group,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) as job_temp, (select max(job_log_id) as schedulingCount4Historical,count(job_log_id) schedulingCount4Daily from skyworld_job_log where create_time between date_sub(now(), interval 1 day) and now() and job_group = #{group,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) as scheduler_temp, (select count(stl.task_log_id) as taskErrorCount4Daily from skyworld_task_log stl where stl.create_time between date_sub(now(), interval 1 day) and now() and stl.task_status != 'SUCCESS' and stl.task_key like concat(#{group,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')) as task_error, (select count(job_log_id) as jobErrorCount4Daily from skyworld_job_log where create_time between date_sub(now(), interval 1 day) and now() and job_handle_code not in ('LOG_JOB_EXECUTION_VETOED','LOG_STATUS_JOB_FINISHED', 'LOG_STATUS_JOB_SCHEDULING', 'FINISHED', 'LOG_JOB_EXECUTION_MISFIRE') and job_group = #{group,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) as job_error

select * from (select count(job_log_id) as schedulerTotal from skyworld_job_log where create_time between date_sub(now(), interval 1 day) and now() and job_group = #{group,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) as total, (select count(job_log_id) as misTriggerCount from skyworld_job_log where create_time between date_sub(now(), interval 1 day) and now() and job_handle_code = 'LOG_JOB_EXECUTION_MISFIRE' and job_group = #{group,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) as misTrigger, (select count(job_log_id) as schedulerError from skyworld_job_log where job_handle_code not in ('LOG_JOB_EXECUTION_VETOED','LOG_STATUS_JOB_FINISHED', 'LOG_STATUS_JOB_SCHEDULING', 'FINISHED', 'LOG_JOB_EXECUTION_MISFIRE') and create_time between date_sub(now(), interval 1 day) and now() and job_group = #{group,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) as jobError, (select count(task_log_id) as executeError from skyworld_task_log where create_time between date_sub(now(), interval 1 day) and now() and task_status = 'FAIL' and task_key like concat(#{group,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')) as taskError, (select count(task_log_id) as executeTotal from skyworld_task_log where create_time between date_sub(now(), interval 1 day) and now() and task_key like concat(#{group,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')) as taskExecuteTotal;

select * from (select task_key as taskKey, count(task_key) as errorCount,job_key as jobKey ,create_time as errorTime from skyworld_task_log stl where create_time between date_sub(now(), interval 1 day) and now() and task_key like concat(#{group,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') and task_status != 'SUCCESS' group by task_key limit 10) temp order by errorCount desc;

select DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00') as schedulerTime, count(*) as schedulerCount from skyworld_task_log stl inner join skyworld_basic_job sbj on sbj.job_key = stl.job_key where sbj.job_group = #{group,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and stl.task_key != 'endTask' and create_time between date_sub(now(), interval 1 day) and now() GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H');
